Adventurers' Guide:
Combine your strengths with other adventurers to defeat dangerous monsters in special hunting grounds. If you do so, you'll obtain "Marks of an Adventurer."
Obtaining marks proves that you are truly a great adventurer, and I have several unique items available to help great adventurers.
Adventurers' Guides throughout the world accept different kinds of marks... you may want to keep that in mind when choosing your adventures.
